test_scenarios.name: Homepage Load and Navigation
steps: Verify the homepage loads successfully and all key sections (e.g., Women, Men, Kids, New In) are visible and clickable.
test_scenarios.expected_result: Homepage loads without errors. Key navigation links are functional and redirect to relevant sections.

test_scenarios.name: Product Search and Results
steps: Enter a valid search term (e.g., 'dress') in the search bar.
Click the search button or press Enter.
test_scenarios.expected_result: Search results page displays relevant products based on the search term.

test_scenarios.name: Product Detail Page
steps: Navigate to a product detail page from a category or search result (e.g., click on a specific dress).
Verify that the product image, name, price, and available sizes are displayed.

test_scenarios.name: Add Product to Cart
steps: On a product detail page, select a size (if applicable).
test_scenarios.expected_result: The product is added to the shopping bag, and a confirmation message or visual indicator (e.g., update of cart icon) is displayed.

test_scenarios.name: View Shopping Bag
steps: Click on the shopping bag icon in the header.
Verify that the added product is present in the shopping bag with correct quantity and price.
test_scenarios.expected_result: Shopping bag displays the added product with accurate details.

test_scenarios.name: Initiate Checkout
steps: From the shopping bag, click the 'Checkout' button.
Verify the user is redirected to the checkout page.
test_scenarios.expected_result: User is redirected to the checkout page
